member.name: T:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService
member.summary: The class.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.GetSubtitleFormatsAsync
member.summary: List subtitle formats recognized by the api.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.GetUserInformationAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gather informations about the user authenticated by a bearer token. User information are already sent when user is authenticated, and the remaining downloads is returned with each download, but you can also get these information here.
member.param: User token created in the login endpoint.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.GetSubtitleLanguagesAsync
member.summary: Get the languages table containing the codes and names used through the api.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.LoginAsync(MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.Models.NewLogin)
member.summary: Create a token to authenticate a user.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.LogoutAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Destroy a user token to end a session. Bearer token is required for this endpoint.
member.param: The user token created in the login endpoint.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.GetPopularFeaturesAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Discover popular features on opensubtitles.com, according to last 30 days downloads.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.GetLatestSubtitlesAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Lists 60 latest uploaded subtitles.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.GetMostDownloadedSubtitlesAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Discover popular subtitles, according to last 30 days downloads on opensubtitles.com. This list can be filtered by language code or feature type (movie, episode).

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.GetSubtitleForDownloadAsync(MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.Models.NewDownload,System.String)
member.summary: Request a download url for a subtitle. The download count is calculated on this action, not the file download itself.
member.remarks: The download URL is temporary, and cannot be used more than 3 hours, so do not cache it, but you can download the file more than once if needed. The and must be indicated for subtitle conversions, we want to make sure you know what you are doing, and therefore collected the current FPS from the subtitle search result, or calculated it somehow.
member.param: The user token created in the login endpoint.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.SearchSubtitlesAsync(MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.Models.NewSubtitleSearch)
member.summary: Find subtitle for a video file. All parameters can be combined following various logics: searching by a specific external id (imdb, tmdb), a file moviehash, or a simple text query.
member.remarks: For best results with automatic searching based on file analysis, send the file name as a query together with the moviehash.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.SearchFeaturesAsync(MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.Models.NewFeatureSearch)
member.summary: With the "query" parameter, search for a Feature from a simple text input. Typically used for a text search or autocomplete. With an ID, get basic information and subtitles count for a specific title.
member.remarks: If you create an autocomplete, don't set a too small refresh limit, remember you must not go over 40 requests per 10 seconds.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesService.GuessitAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts as much information as possible from a video filename. It has a very powerful matcher that allows to guess properties from a video using its filename only. This matcher works with both movies and tv shows episodes.

member.name: T:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.InconsistentConverter`1
member.summary: Converts the inconsistent result sets.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to deserialize.

member.name: T:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesHasher
member.summary: The Open Subtitles movie file hasher.
member.remarks:
Open Subtitles is using special hash function to match subtitle files against movie files. Hash is not dependent on file name of movie file.
Originally implemented by: https://trac.opensubtitles.org/projects/opensubtitles/wiki/HashSourceCodes.

member.name: M:MovieCollection.OpenSubtitles.OpenSubtitlesHasher.GetFileHash(System.String)
member.summary: Computes the hash value for a file by using the default hash algorithm.
member.param: The file to compute the hash from.
member.returns: A string contaning the computed hash.
